short_summary: Medium Truck with Landscape Dump Body
full_summary:
____________________

# Request for Proposal: Truck, Medium with Landscape Dump Body

## Official Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of one (1) Truck, Medium with Landscape Dump Body, to support the operational needs of Parks Canada Agency (PC).

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4591424629-Doc4591697373
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4591424629
* **Publication Date:** 2024-06-04
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-03T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To Be Determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** To Be Determined
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Goods and Services

* **United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC):** *25101601 Dump trucks
* **Description:** One (1) Truck, Medium with Landscape Dump Body
* **Procurement Category:** *Goods

## Tender Criteria Criteria

* The tender will be awarded based on the Lowest Price
* Suppliers are expected to fulfill all requirements outlined in the Statement of Requirement and Technical Criteria, found at the Annex statement.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers who have a contract with one of the following free trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Delivery Locations

* The goods must be delivered to Chambly.

## Contacts

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contractor Name:** Jacques Legault

To view the full tender details, please visit the SAP Ariba link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19908096?extsite=MTk5MDgwOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
